(static) getExports(client, paramsopt) → {Promise}

Get exports logs. For medical traceability, Orthanc stores a log of all the resources that have been exported to remote modalities.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
client Client Client which will be used to perform the request
params Object <optional>
 last, "limit" and "since" arguments
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
last Boolean <optional>
 false Specify whether or not only the last export should be returned
since Integer <optional>
 0 Set the sequence number since which exports should be returned
limit Integer <optional>
 100 Set the returned exports limit. Default and maximum values are the same : 100
Source:
  • lib/exports.js, line 17
Returns:
The expected response is a JSON object
Type
Promise
